qrCodeTips: QR code is a recommended invitation link, which can be shared according to QR code
blind_explain:
1. Rule description
Each round for 5 days, starting from the first round, blind boxes can be purchased; the number of blind boxes released per day changes dynamically according to the number of card slot groups purchased by the mining farm;

2. Card issuance rules and consumption

(1) Card types of odd-numbered rounds

The first day: 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, JOKER; consumption: 40USDT/time

The second day: 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, JOKER; consumption: 50USDT/time

The third day: 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, JOKER; consumption: 60USDT/time

The fourth day: 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, JOKER; consumption: 70USDT/time

The fifth day: 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, JOKER; consumption: 80USDT/time

(1)Card types of even-numbered round 

Day 1: 7, 8, 9, 10, J, JOKER; consumption: 90USDT/time

The second day: 8, 9, 10, J, Q, JOKER; consumption: 100USDT/time

The third day: 9, 10, J, Q, K, JOKER; consumption: 110USDT/time

The fourth day: 10, J, Q, K, A, JOKER; consumption: 120USDT/time

The fifth day: J, Q, K, A, JOKER; consumption: 130USDT/time
